seo.title: Equalizing Chess
seo.meta_description: Explore the unpredictable realm of Equalizing Chess, a web app that challenges the traditional norms of chess by providing a dynamic and adaptable playing experience. Embrace the unpredictability as the AI strives to match the skill level of human players, creating an engaging and level playing field for enthusiasts of all backgrounds. Whether you're a seasoned grandmaster or a casual player, Equalizing Chess ensures a unique and balanced chess encounter, where the pursuit of equality takes center stage. Immerse yourself in a chess adventure that mirrors the twists and turns of human intuition, making every move an exciting and strategic endeavor. Unleash the potential for thrilling matches with Equalizing Chess, where the pursuit of equality knows no bounds.

home.title: Equalizing Chess
home.description: Equalizing Chess is a chess game where the engine tries to play as well or as badly as the user. To do this, he tries to balance the position in each movement.

position.stockfish-slow: Stockfish is working slow. Consider lowering the search depth in configuration screen.

seo.title: Information - Equalizing Chess
seo.meta_description: Version information and 3dparty resources used in Equalizing Chess

about.title: About
about.description: Equalizing Chess (v{version}) is a free and open source project.
about.third-party: Following software and resources has been used:
about.chessjs-description: chess.js: a Javascript chess library for chess move generation/validation, piece placement/movement, and check/checkmate/draw detection
about.stockfish-js-description:
Stockfish.js: WASM implementation of Stockfish chess engine by Nathan Rugg (nmrugg)
{stockfishRunningVersion}
about.typescript: TypeScript: JavaScript with syntax for types
about.ionic: Ionic Framework: the mobile sdk for the web
about.alpinejs-i18n: Alpine i18n: Internationalization (i18n) support for Alpine.js
about.navigo: Navigo: a simple vanilla JavaScript router
about.howlerjs: howler.js: javascript audio library for the modern web
about.enable-threads: enable-threads.js: creates a service worker that cross-origin-isolates the page
about.logo: Logo: designed by Inipagi from Iconfinder
about.pacifier: Pacifier: designed by Smashicons from Flaticon
about.pieces: Chess pieces: from their respective authors (see details...)
about.font: Russo One: text font by Jovanny Lemonad
about.move-sound: Move sound: from lichess static resources
about.capture-sound: Capture sound: from lichess static resources

home.title: Equalizing Chess
home.description: Equalizing Chess es un juego de ajedrez donde el motor intenta jugar tan bien o mal como el usuario. Para ello, él intenta balancear la posición en cada movimiento.

Stockfish.js: implementación WASM del motor de ajedrez Stockfish por Nathan Rugg (nmrugg)

about.typescript: TypeScript: JavaScript con sintaxis para tipos
